EmailTemplate.name: ProMED - WTL Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Your ProMED Quick Application Has Been Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your application!
Your inquiry is important to us. We value your interest and look forward to sharing our healthcare expertise with you to find the appropriate financial solution.
Someone from the ProMED team will reach out to you in the next 24 hours.
Sincerely,
Quoting Team ProMED Healthcare Financing
Contact
ProMED Healthcare Financing 150 Motor Parkway, Suite 104 Hauppauge, NY 11788
Phone: 631-901-1050 Fax: 631-683-0010 request@promedhcf.com
